results.p: Aug 9, 2024 — The number of the beast is a well-known instance of biblical numerology appearing in chapter 13, verse 18 of the Revelation to John.
The number of the beast is six hundred sixty-six or χξϛ (in Greek numerals, χ represents 600, ξ represents 60 and ϛ represents 6).

results.p: What does 666 mean? The number 666 is identified as the Number of the Beast as mentioned in the Book of Revelation (13:15–18).

results.p: Mar 1, 2018 — The number 666 is used to signify the devil, the antichrist, or evil in general.

results.p: According to the last book in the Bible, 666 is the number, or name, of the wild beast with seven heads and ten horns that comes out of the sea.

results.p: Aug 29, 2023 — According to most scholars, 666 was a coded reference to Nero, a "beastly" emperor who brutally persecuted early Christians in the Roman Empire.
